text: Mahdi Abdul-Sahib (born 28 July 1956) is a former Iraqi football forward who played for Iraq at the 1978 Asian Games and 1982 Asian Games. Mahdi played for Iraq between 1978 and 1981. http://niiiis.com/players2.html ==References== Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:1956 births
title: Mahdi Abdul-Sahib
